title: CORRIGENDA
html:
CORRIGENDA

Volume IV, Number 2, “We Shall Know Them by Their Roots”:

  1. Taj Mahal is a person, not a group.

  2. Runaways is not “an all-female band” (unless the drummer has been to a Danish surgeon lately).

  3. Booker T. and the M.G.'s bears no reference to automobiles since T. is Booker T. Washington's middle initial and M.G.'s are members of the Memphis Group.

  4. Fleetwood Mac is not a Cadillac on a hamburger but a hybrid name taken from the band's rhythm section, drummer Mick Fleetwood and bassist John McVie.

[Joe Fusco, Menlo Park, California]

The Sopwith Camel rock group is named after a World War I biplane, and should be listed among the methods of travel rather than among the wildlife.

[Victoria Nowell, Chilliwack, British Columbia]

Mr. Schulz had better brush up on his Latin if he thinks the name Ars Nova an astronomical reference. It means, quite simply, 'New Art.'

[Andrew Baird, Princeton, New Jersey]
